Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2018 02:32PM SarahB57 wrote: Not many people will know how but you can do BP on your thigh with a thigh cuff. Have no clue about which veins to use. My mom had bilateral mastectomy and used one arm all the time for blood draws. On another note, does anyone wear a medical id bracelet stating no blood draws or bp on your arm?
Posts.Title: Blood draws and BP on effected arm Beachygirl SummerAngel
